Title: #EndSARS: Police reforms linger as Nigerians demand justice five years after
Summary: There were no wreaths laid or silent marches and candlelight procession held at the #EndSARS epicentre . The scars of the protests that rocked the popular Lekki Tollgate Plaza, remain in silence .

Title: Chaos as police disperse Abuja protesters, S’East shuts down for Kanu
Summary: Security operatives fired live bullets and teargas to disperse protesters in Abuja . They were demanding the release of the detained leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu .

Title: Foundation unveils new site for Olokun festival
Summary: Foundation unveils new site for Olokun festival . Festival Foundation (OFF) has disclosed that this year’s festival celebration will be held at the newly established site named Kakanfo Falola Beach in Badagry .

Title: Delta’s N1.5tr 2026 budget to prioritise infrastructure, social welfare
Summary: Delta’s proposed N1.5 trillion 2026 budget will focus on capital projects and social welfare . Governor Sheriff Sheriff Ogunlesi wants to consolidate on his More Agenda .

Title: Ondo Assembly workers suspend planned strike after truce with govt
Summary: Olorunfemi also appreciated the Speaker of the Ondo State House of Assembly, Chief Olamide Oladiji, for his unwavering support during the struggle .

Title: Emami faults usage of Warri kingdom by non-Itsekiri monarchs
Summary: Chief Ayirimi Emami faulted usage of Warri Kingdom by non-Itsekiri monarchs . Emami was speaking during a low key celebration to mark the 8th year anniversary of his presidency .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, October 21, 2025
Summary: On the official window, the mid-market USD/NGN stood close to ₦1,468–1,470 according to recent data .

Title: Alleged indecent videos: Kano Court orders TikTokers to marry within 60 days
Summary: Kano court orders two popular TikTokers, Idris Mai Wushirya and Basira Yar Guda, to marry within 60 days . A magistrate court sitting in Kano has ordered the pair to wed within 60 minutes .

Title: We’re shielding no ally, EFCC recovered N500bn in 2 yrs — Tinubu
Summary: The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission has recovered assets worth over N500 billion and secured more than 700 convictions in the past two years . President Bola Tinubu: We’re shielding no ally, EFCC recovered N500bn in 2 yrs .
